name: Valhalla: Glory to the Metal
description:
Space fight an evil space navy with space weapons in SPACE! Valhalla: Glory to the Metal blends the shoot-em-up (or "shmup" for short) and the swarm survival (or Vampire Survivor-like as it's also known) together for a wild mix of shooting, chaos and of course, BULLETS. Over 40 perks and a dozen weapons to rip your enemies to shreds. 

Witness Valhalla!

GLORY TO THE METAL!

Also a special thanks to all below for hosting their assets on itch.io and making this project possible!
